grade_comment:
Grade: 95

Comment: The student provided a comprehensive and accurate explanation of the significance of the term "Holy One" in the Bible, both in relation to God and Jesus Christ. They effectively highlighted the attributes of purity, holiness, and perfection associated with this title, supported by relevant scriptural references from both the Old and New Testaments. Great job in emphasizing the divine nature and authority conveyed through the term "Holy One."
